T04sanss06u:8: sati satvârthe yad aṅgam anupayogi tad dṛḍhatarasmṛtyapekṣāniścalamādhyachandaparâpattīkṛtaṃ sarvadhīraceṣṭāsmṛtiḥ |
T04sanss06u:13: yaḥ śrotā vaktavyaḥ sa yāvanmātreṇa dhvaninârthaṃ jānāti |
T04sanss06u:27: ayaṃ câdaraḥ śamathamāhātmyaṃ jñātvā tātparyeṇa jāyate |
T04sanss06u:33: anunnahanatâcapalatâcañcalatā saumyatā guptatā karmaṇyatâjāneyatâikâgratâikârāmatā saṃgaṇikāvarjanatā vivekaratiḥ kāyavivekaś cittâvibhramo 'raṇyamukhamanasikāratâlpêcchatā |
T04sanss06u:34: yāvad īryāpathaguptiḥ kālajñatā samayajñatā mātrajñatā muktijñatā |
T04sanss06u:36: kiṃ punar asya śamasya māhātmyaṃ yathābhūtajñānajananaśaktiḥ |
T04sanss06u:37: yasmāt samāhito yathābhūtaṃ prajānātîty avadan muniḥ ||
T04sanss06u:42: idaṃ mayā samādhimukhaṃ sarvadharmayathābhūtadarśanaṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ niṣpādayitavyaṃ |
T04sanss06u:43: sa tayā mahākaruṇayā saṃcodyamāno 'dhiśīlam adhicittam adhiprajñaṃ ca
T04sanss06u:46: idaṃ śamathamāhātmyam ātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ cânantâpāyâdiduḥkhasamatikramânanta laukikalokôttarasukhasaṃpatprakarṣapāraprāptyātmakam avagamya tadabhilāṣeṇâtāpo bhāvayitavyaḥ |
T04sanss06u:52: yaś ca niṣphalaṃ varjayati tasyânarthā na saṃbhava-
T04sanss06u:55: tasmād ātmabhāvaṃ rakṣitukāmena smṛtimūlam anviṣya nityam upasthitasmṛtinā bhavitavyaṃ ||
T04sanss06u:62: yayā smṛtyā sarvakleśānāṃ prādurbhāvo na bhavati |
T04sanss06u:63: yayā smṛtyā sarvamārakarmaṇām avatāraṃ na dadāti |
T04sanss06u:64: yayā smṛtyôtpathe vā kumārge vā na patati |
T04sanss06u:65: yayā smṛtyā dauvārikabhūtayā sarveṣām akuśalānāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇām avakāśaṃ dadātîyam ucyate samyaksmṛtir iti ||
T04sanss06u:71: yathā yathā câsyaḥ [[DOUBT]] kāyaḥ sthito bhavati tathā tathâiva prajānāti
T04sanss06u:73: so 'tikrāman vā pratikrāman vā saṃprajānaṃś cārī bhavati |
T04sanss06u:75: aśite pīte khādite nidrāklamaprativinodane āgate gate sthite niṣaṇṇe supte jāgarite bhāṣite tuṣṇībhāve pratisaṃlayane saṃprajānaṃś cārī bhavatîti ||
T04sanss06u:81: ato 'vagamyate ye kecit samādhihetavaḥ prayogās te śīlântargatêti |
T04sanss06u:85: tathā śīlârthinâpi samādhau yatnaḥ kāryaḥ tatrâiva sūtre vacanāt |
T04sanss06u:91: etābhyāṃ ca śīlasamādhibhyām anyonyasaṃvardhanakarābhyāṃ cittakarmapariniṣpattiḥ etāvatī cêyaṃ bodhisatvaśikṣā yad uta cittaparikarma |
T04sanss06u:96: api tu cittena nīyate lokaḥ cittaṃ cittaṃ na paśyati |
T04sanss06u:97: cittena cīyate karma śubhaṃ vā yadi vâśubham ||
T04sanss06u:103: sâivaṃ vyupaparīkṣamāṇaś citte sûpasthitasmṛtir viharati na cittasya vaśaṃ gacchati |
T04sanss06u:104: ap tu cittam evâsya vaśaṃ gacchati |
T04sanss06u:108: yo 'yaṃ dharmo dharmêty ucyate nâyaṃ dharmo deśastho*na pradeśastho
T04sanss06u:109: 'nyatra svacittâdhīno dharmaḥ tasmān mayā svacittaṃ svārādhitaṃ
T04sanss06u:114: tatra bodhisatvo*doṣebhyaś cittaṃ nivārya guṇeṣu pravartayati ||
T04sanss06u:117: ayaṃ bhagavan dharmaṃ samādānaḥ sukhâbhisaṃbodhāya saṃvartatae iti ||
T04sanss06u:128: tathâtrâiva māyādevy-adarśanâkulībhūte āryasudhane ratnanetrāyā nagaradevatāyās taddarśanârtham iyam anuśāsanī |
T04sanss06u:138: cittanagarapraticchādanaprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ vipuladharmacchatrasarvâkuśala dharmapratipakṣâbhinirharaṇatayā |
T04sanss06u:139: cittanagaravivaraṇaprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ ādhyātmikabāhyavastu sarvajagatsaṃprāpaṇatayā
T04sanss06u:141: yāvad evaṃ cittanagaraviśuddhyabhiyuktena kulaputra bodhisatvena śakyaṃ sarvakuśalamūla samārjanam anuprāptuṃ |
T04sanss06u:150: śamāc ca na calec cittaṃ bāhyaceṣṭānivartanāt ||
T04sanss06u:151: asaṃprajanyaparatantrasya muṣitasmṛteś ca cittaṃ calati samīhitād ālambanād anyatra nīyamānatvāt
T04sanss06u:154: tā bhavanti tadā tadvaśatvād ekasminn ālambane nibaddhaṃ yāvad iṣyate tāvat tiṣṭhati |
T04sanss06u:156: adyatve 'pi ca satvârthakṣamo bhavaty eva prasādakaratvāt |
T04sanss06u:159: āvarjayej janaṃ bhavyam ādeyaś câpi jāyate ||
T04sanss06u:160: etad eva ca bodhisatvasya kṛtyam yad uta satvâvarjanaṃ |
T04sanss06u:163: tathā tathā bhagavan bodhisatvena pratipattavyaṃ yat sahadarśanenâiva satvāḥ prasīdeyuḥ |
T04sanss06u:165: na bhagavan bodhisatvasyânyat karaṇīyam asty anyatra satvâvarjanāt |
T04sanss06u:167: evaṃ punar akriyamāṇe ko doṣêty āha |
T04sanss06u:168: anādeyaṃ tu taṃ lokaḥ paribhūya jinâṅkuraṃ |
T04sanss06u:171: yena câsya paribhavâivam anartho ratnameghe jinenôktas tena saṃkṣepasaṃvaraḥ |yenâprasādaḥ satvānāṃ tad yatnena vivarjayed iti ||
T04sanss06u:174: yāvad iha bodhisatvo nâsthāne viharati nâkāle |
T04sanss06u:175: nâkālabhāṇī bhavati nâkālajño bhavati nâdeśajño bhavati |
T04sanss06u:185: yaḥ satvān rakṣati sa śīlaṃ rakṣatîti |
T04sanss06u:186: anayā kanīyena mātṛgrāmeṇa saha rahoavasthâdiṣu lokarakṣā ca kṛtā syāt |
T04sanss06u:187: evaṃ bhogyeṣu jalasthaleṣu mūtrapurīṣaśleṣmapūyâdīnāṃ kutsitānāṃ rahasy arahasi côtsargaṃ na kuryād devamanuṣyacittarakṣârthaṃ ||
T04sanss06u:188: saddharmasmṛtyupasthāne ca rahôtsiṣṭaṃ kṛtvânutsiṣṭâhāreṣv adadataḥ pretagatiḥ paṭhyate
T04sanss06u:190: na purato dantakāṣṭhaṃ khāditavyaṃ na purataḥ kheṭe nikṣiptavyêti |
T04sanss06u:191: eṣa ca gauravalajjāvidhiḥ sarvadraṣṭavyo na brahmacāriṣv eva |
T04sanss06u:192: atra tu sūtre brahmacāry-adhikāraḥ teṣu gurutarâpattibhayasaṃdarśanârthaṃ ||
T04sanss06u:196: tathā brahmaparipṛcchāyām apy uktaṃ na ca vadhasadṛśena bodhisatvena bhavitavyam iti |
T04sanss06u:197: tathā prātimokṣād api lokâprasādakaram anveṣya varjanīyaṃ |
T04sanss06u:200: pralambapādaṃ nâsīta na bāhuṃ mardayet samam ||
T04sanss06u:201: evaṃ svayam apy utprekṣya dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca lokâprasādaṃ rakṣeta |
T04sanss06u:202: aprasādakaravacanavarjanaṃ tu na sukaram iti smaraṇabodhanârtham upadarśyate |
T04sanss06u:220: na khalu punaḥ kulaputra bodhisatvasya vāg raktā vā duṣṭā vā mūḍhā vā kliṣṭā vā |
T04sanss06u:228: yêyaṃ vāgamanojñā svasantānaparasantānavināśanī tathārūpāṃ vācaṃ prahāya |
T04sanss06u:229: yêyaṃ vāk snigdhā mṛdvī manojñā madhurā priyakaraṇī manâpakaraṇī [[DOUBT]]
T04sanss06u:230: hitakaraṇī karṇasukhā hṛdayaṃgamā premaṇī varṇaviṣpaṣṭā vijñeyā śravaṇīyâniśritā bahujanakāntā bahujanapriyā bahujanamanâpā [[DOUBT]]
T04sanss06u:231: vijñapraśastā sarvasatvahitasukhâvahā manôtplāvakarī manaḥprahlādanakarī svaparasantānapramodanakarī rāgadveṣamohasarvakleśâpraśāmanī tathārūpāṃ vācaṃ niścārayati |
T04sanss06u:232: yāvad itihāsapūrvakam api vacanaṃ parihārya pariharatîti ||
T04sanss06u:239: na bodhisatvenâiṣā vāg bhāṣitavyā yayâparo vyāpadyeta |
T04sanss06u:240: na sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yayâparaṃ tāpayet |
T04sanss06u:241: na bodhisatvena sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yat paro jānīyāt |
T04sanss06u:242: na sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yayârthā nirarthā |
T04sanss06u:243: na bodhisatvena sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yayā na vidyām utpādayet |
T04sanss06u:244: na sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yā satvānāṃ na hṛdayaṃgamā na paurī na karṇasukhā
T04sanss06u:252: asya tu granthavistarasyâyaṃ piṇḍârtho bodhisatvena manasā nityaṃ dhārayitavyaḥ ||
T04sanss06u:256: nirmāṇam iva nirmānaṃ dhārayāmy eṣa mānasam |
T04sanss06u:264: tasmāt piṇḍapātrād ekaṃ pratyaṃśaṃ sabrahmacāriṇāṃ sthāpayati |
T04sanss06u:265: dvitīyaṃ duṣkhitānāṃ tṛtīyaṃ vinipatitānāṃ caturtham ātmanā paribhuṅkte |
T04sanss06u:275: tena taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya kuśalapakṣâbhimukhena bhavitavyam ity ādi ||
T04sanss06u:277: tena grāmaṃ vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caratā dharmasaṃnāhaṃ saṃnahya piṇḍāya cartavyaṃ
T04sanss06u:285: dāntâjāneyacittena pūrvadharmamanasikāram anutsṛjatā nâmiṣaprakṣiptayā santatyā piṇḍāya cartavyaṃ sâvadānacāriṇā ca bhavitavyaṃ |
T04sanss06u:286: yataś ca piṇḍapāto labhyate tatrânunayo na kartavyaḥ yataś ca na labhyate tatra pratighāto*nôtpādayitavyaḥ
T04sanss06u:287: daśakulapraveśe na câikādaśāt kulād bhikṣā na labhyate |
T04sanss06u:288: tathâpi na paritaptavyaṃ evaṃ ca cittam utpādayitavyam |
T04sanss06u:289: evaṃ bahukṛtyā hy ete śramaṇabrāhmaṇagṛhapatayo na tair avaśyaṃ mama dātavyaṃ |
T04sanss06u:290: idaṃ tāvad āścaryaṃ yan mām ete samanvāharanti |
T04sanss06u:291: kaḥ punar vādo yad bhikṣāṃ dāsyanti |
T04sanss06u:293: ye câsya satvāś cakṣuṣu ābhāsam āgacchanti strīpuruṣadārakadārikāḥ |
T04sanss06u:295: tathâhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā ye me satvāś cakṣuṣâbhāsam āgacchanti piṇḍapātaṃ vā dāsyanti tān sugatigāminaḥ kariṣyāmi |
T04sanss06u:297: tena lūhaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā piṇḍapāta saṃgṛhya samantāc caturdiśaṃ vyavalokayitavyaṃ |
T04sanss06u:302: yadi daridraṃ satvaṃ paśyati tena tatpiṇḍapātāt saṃvibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ |
T04sanss06u:303: atha na kañcit satvaṃ daridraṃ paśyati |
T04sanss06u:305: santy anābhāsagatāḥ satvā ye mama cakṣuṣu ābhāsaṃ nâgacchanti |
T04sanss06u:308: tena tat piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā tad araṇyâyatanam abhiruhya dhautapāṇinā śobhanasamācāreṇa śramaṇacāritrakalpa-
T04sanss06u:315: bodhiprāptaś ca punar dharmeṇa saṃgrahaṃ kariṣyāmi |
T04sanss06u:316: yadi punar asya lūhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhavati tenâivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ |
T04sanss06u:317: lūhâhāratayā me laghuḥ kāyo bhaviṣyati prahāṇakṣamôccāraprasrāvaniṣyandanaś ca me parītto bhaviṣyati |
T04sanss06u:321: yadā punar asya prabhūtaḥ piṇḍapāto bhavati tatrâpi mātrâbhojinā bhavitavyaṃ utsarjanadharmiṇā ca |
T04sanss06u:322: tataḥ piṇḍapātād anyatarāyāṃ śilāyām avatīryâivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ |
T04sanss06u:323: ye kecin mṛgapakṣisaṃgâmiṣabhojanenârthikās te dattâdānāḥ paribhuñjatām iti ||
T04sanss06u:336: tena nâivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ |puruṣo me piṇḍapātaṃ dad-ti na strīḥ |
T04sanss06u:337: strī me piṇḍapātaṃ dadāti na puruṣaḥ |
T04sanss06u:338: dārako me piṇḍapātaṃ dadāti na dārikā |
T04sanss06u:339: dārikā me piṇḍapātaṃ dadāti na dārakaḥ |
T04sanss06u:342: capalaṃ labhe 'haṃ na kṛcchreṇa praviṣṭamātraṃ ca māṃ samanvāhareyuḥ |
T04sanss06u:347: na hīnadaridrabhojanaṃ labhe 'haṃ pratyudgaccheyur māṃ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāḥ |
T04sanss06u:350: prāyeṇa hi satvā rasagṛddhā bhojanahetoḥ pāpāni karmāṇi kṛtvā narakeṣûpapadyante |
T04sanss06u:351: ye ye punaḥ saṃtuṣṭâgṛddhâlulopā rasapratiprasrabdhā jihvêndriyasaṃtuṣṭāḥ kiyallūhenâpi bhojanena jñāpayanti |
T04sanss06u:355: evaṃ kāśyapa piṇḍacārikeṇa bhikṣuṇā rasatṛṣṇāṃ vinivartayitvā nidhyaptacittena suparipakvān kulmāṣān paribhuñjatā na paritaptavyam |
T04sanss06u:359: yadi punaḥ kāśyapa piṇḍacāriko bhikṣur meghâkulavṛṣṭikālasamaye vartamāne na śaknuyāt piṇḍāyâvatartuṃ
T04sanss06u:360: tena maitryâhārasaṃnaddhena dharmacintāmanasikārapratiṣṭhitena dvirātraṃ trirātraṃ vā bhaktacchadacchinnenâivaṃ saṃjñôtpādayitavyā |
T04sanss06u:361: santi yāmalaukikāḥ pretā duṣkarakarmakāriṇo ye varṣaśatena kheṭapiṇḍam apy āhāraṃ na pratilabhante
T04sanss06u:362: tan mayā dharmayoniśaś cintāpratiṣṭhitena kāyadaurbalyaṃ vā cittadaurbalyaṃ vā nôtpādayitavyaṃ
T04sanss06u:368: ciṃ kārayet tatra kule āsane niṣadya dhārmī kathā kartavyā |
T04sanss06u:369: yāvan na sa piṇḍapātaḥ śucīkrṭo bhavet tena piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā utthāyâsanāt prakramitavyaṃ
T04sanss06u:372: nâvabhāsakareṇa bhavitavyaṃ na lapanā na kuhanā kartavyā ||
T04sanss06u:375: lūho me piṇḍapāto rukṣo me piṇḍapātâsīn na ca me yāvadarthaṃ bhuktaṃ |
T04sanss06u:380: sarvam etat piṇḍacārikeṇa bhikṣuṇā na kartavyaṃ |
T04sanss06u:382: yat pātre patitaṃ lūhaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā śubhaṃ vâśubhaṃ vā tat paribhoktavyam aparitapyamānenâśayaśuddhena dharmanidhyaptibahulena |
T04sanss06u:385: yasyāś cântike piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya na śaknoty ātmanaḥ parasya cârthaṃ paripūrayitum anujānāmy ahaṃ tasya piṇḍacārikasya bodhisatvasya nimantraṇam iti ||
T04sanss06u:390: māṃsaṃ sarvam abhakṣyaṃ kṛpâtmāno bodhisatvasyêti vadāmi ||
T04sanss06u:394: māṃsāni ca palāṇḍūṃś ca madyāni vividhāni ca |
T04sanss06u:395: gṛñjanaṃ laśunaṃ câiva yogī nityaṃ vivarjayet ||
T04sanss06u:396: mrakṣaṇaṃ varjayet tailaṃ śalyaviddheṣu na svapet |
T04sanss06u:397: chidrâchidreṣu satvānāṃ yac ca sthānaṃ mahābhayam ||
T04sanss06u:399: lābhârthaṃ hanyate prāṇī māṃsârthaṃ dīyate dhanaṃ |
T04sanss06u:402: yo 'tikramya muner vākyaṃ māṃsaṃ bhakṣeta durmatiḥ |
T04sanss06u:404: te yānti paramaṃ ghoraṃ narakaṃ pāpaka-riṇaḥ |
T04sanss06u:407: acoditaṃ ca nâivâsti tasmān māṃsaṃ na bhakṣyayet ||
T04sanss06u:408: māṃsaṃ na bhakṣyayed yogī mayā buddhaiś ca garhitaṃ |
T04sanss06u:420: buddhaiś ca bodhisatvaiś ca śrāvakaiś ca vigarhitaṃ |
T04sanss06u:422: brāhmaṇeṣu ca jāyante 'tha vā yogināṃ kule |
T04sanss06u:432: mātrayā pratikūlaṃ ca yogī piṇḍaṃ samācaret ||
T04sanss06u:435: tasmān na bhakṣayen māṃsam udvejajanakaṃ nṛṇāṃ |
T04sanss06u:436: mokṣadharmaniruddhatvād āryāṇām eṣa vai dhvajaḥ ||yat tu jñānavatīparivarte māṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ paṭhyate tan mahârthasādhakatvān
T04sanss06u:444: tenâsmin na maitrī śaṅkâpi nâstîty adoṣaḥ ||
T04sanss06u:449: vinaye 'pi yad anujñātaṃ tat tu trikoṭipariśuddhabhakṣaṇe na
T04sanss06u:454: tatra tatra deśanā pāṭhe śikṣāpadānām ānupūrvīṃ bandhan niśreṇīpadavinyāsayogena |
T04sanss06u:456: tatrôddiṣya krṭāni pratiṣiddhāni tato 'ntaśaḥ prakṛtimṛtāny api pratiṣiddhānîti ||
T04sanss06u:459: śrāvakavinaye 'pi tāvad ātmârthaṃ brahmacaryavāsârthaṃ pātracīvaram api vikrīya |
T04sanss06u:461: kiṃ punar aparimitajanaparitrāṇahetor bodhisatvaśarīrasya durlabhā cêdṛśī
T04sanss06u:463: iti tatpradarśanârthaṃ ca bhagavatā tatra svayaṃ bhaiṣajyôpayogaḥ
T04sanss06u:466: tair yadā pracāritaṃ bhavati tadā satyāṃ velāyām asatyāṃ vā teṣām imāny evaṃrūpāṇi kāyôpastambhanāny upakaraṇāni na labhyante 'bhyavahartuṃ |
T04sanss06u:467: yad uta sarpir vā tailaṃ vā mūlaraso vā gaṇḍaraso vā phalaraso vā |
T04sanss06u:468: na cânyān abhyavaharato dṛṣṭvā pratighacittam utpādayati |
T04sanss06u:469: yadi punaḥ khalu paścādbhaktiko bodhisatvo vā
T04sanss06u:472: yathārūpeṇâsya glānyena jīvitântarāyo bhavati kuśalapakṣântarāyo vā tena niṣkaukṛtyena bhūtvā nirvicikitsakena bhaiṣajyacittam upasthāpya
T04sanss06u:476: hrīrapatrāpyakāpair niḥ ... [[DOUBT]] pracchādanârthaṃ tu śramaṇaliṅgasaṃdarśanârtham imāni ca kāṣāyāṇi devamānuṣâsurasya lokasya
T04sanss06u:485: etāni ca kāṣāyāṇy āryamārgasaṃbhārânukūlānîti kṛtvā tathā kariṣyāmo yathā nâikakṣaṇam api sakaṣāyāḥ kāye kāṣāyāṇi dhārayiṣyāmêti ||
T04sanss06u:487: ye punas te kāśyapa vaidaryâsaṃyatêtaḥ śramaṇaguṇadharmād uddhurāḥ kāye kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dhārayanti |
T04sanss06u:490: tatra kāśyapa pratyekanarake śramaṇarūpapratirūpeṇa tāḥ kāraṇāḥ kāryante
T04sanss06u:492: yaḥ kaścit tatra teṣām upabhogaparibhogaḥ sa sarvâdīptaḥ saṃprajvalitâikajvālībhūtaḥ |
T04sanss06u:493: tatra taiḥ śramaṇavarṇarūpeṇa duṣkhāṃ vedanām anubhavantîti ||
T04sanss06u:496: yadi bhaved abhyavakāśiko bodhisatvo glānakāyo 'pratibalakāyas tena vihārakṣitenâivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ |
T04sanss06u:499: tathâhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā vihārasyâiva kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya ghaṭiṣyāmi |
T04sanss06u:500: tatra ca vihāre na gṛddhim utpādayāmi nâdhyavasānaṃ |
T04sanss06u:502: kartavyo dānapatīnām anugraho nâsmābhir ātmambharibhir bhavitavyam iti ||
T04sanss06u:504: te śayyāṃ kalpayanto dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayanti |
T04sanss06u:505: pādasyôpari pādam ādhāya cīvaraiḥ asaṃvṛtakāyāḥ smṛtāḥ |
T04sanss06u:508: na pārśvasukham anytra yāvad evâiṣāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ sthitaye jāpanāyai |
T04sanss06u:509: ity anayā diśā sarvaparibhogāḥ satvârtham adhiṣṭhātavyāḥ |
T04sanss06u:518: atha tasyām eva parṣadi yogâcārāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ dve śate imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā prarudite
T04sanss06u:521: na punar aprāptaphalâikapiṇḍapātam api śraddhādeyasya paribhokṣyāmaḥ ||
T04sanss06u:524: sādhu sādhu kulaputrâivaṃrūpair lajjābhiḥ kaukṛtyasaṃpannaiḥ paralokâvadyabhayadarśibhir idaṃ pravacanaṃ śobhate ||
T04sanss06u:529: yadi bhikṣavo bhikṣur yukto yogâcāro mama śikṣāyāṃ pratipannaḥ sarvasaṃskāreṣv anityadarśī
T04sanss06u:530: sarvasaṃskāraduḥkhaviditaḥ sarvadharmeṣv anātmâdhimuktiḥ śāntanirvāṇâbhikāṅkṣī sumerumātrair ālopaiḥ śraddhādeyaṃ bhuñjīta |
T04sanss06u:532: yeṣāṃ ca dāyakānāṃ dānapatīnāṃ sakāśāc chraddhādeyaṃ paribhuktaṃ tatas teṣāṃ dāyakadānapatīnāṃ
T04sanss06u:537: agram idam aupadhikānāṃ puṇyakriyāvastūnāṃ yêyaṃ maitracittasamāpattiḥ |
T04sanss06u:538: tatra kāśyapa yo bhikṣur dāyakasya dānapater antikāc cīvarapiṇḍapātaṃ paribhujyâpramāṇaṃ cetaḥsamādhiṃ samāpadyate 'pramāṇas tasya dāyakasya dānapateḥ puṇyakriyāvipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ |
T04sanss06u:539: syāt kāśyapa trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau mahāsamudrāṇāṃ kṣayo na tv eva tasya puṇyaniṣyandanasya kaścit kṣayêti ||
T04sanss06u:540: tad evaṃ piṇḍapātagamanaārambhe bhojanârambhe vā triṣu sthāneṣu smṛtir upasthāpyā dāyakânugrahe
T04sanss06u:545: tatrâpi tāvad imāṃ trisamayarājôktāṃ vidyāṃ maṇḍalasamayârtham uccārayet |
T04sanss06u:570: ayam eva paramāṃ rakṣāṃ*mārâdibhyaḥ sarvaduṣṭebhyaḥ karoti |
T04sanss06u:571: hastatāḍena bhasmanā sarṣapair udakena dṛṣṭyā manasā vā sīmābandhaṃ karoti
T04sanss06u:574: ṣu bhaiṣajyam udakaṃ câbhimantryôpayojyaṃ ||vanakusumāni vā caitye pratimāyāṃ saddharmapustake vā samāhito nivedayet ||
T04sanss06u:576: buddhabodhisatvâlambanena sarvasatvârthâbhilāṣiṇā ca cittena bhadracarividhipūrvakaṃ ca japtavyaḥ
T04sanss06u:583: adhimukticaryā śikṣāpadeṣv acalasya nirvicikitsasya duḥśīlapūrvasyâpi sidhyati |
T04sanss06u:587: bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ yasya niḥsaṃgā ca matir bhavet |
T04sanss06u:588: vicikitsā nâiva kartavyā tasyêdaṃ sidhyati dhruvam |
T04sanss06u:590: bodhicittadṛḍhatā câtra pṛthagjanacalacittatāyā niyamârtham uktā na tu bhūmipraviṣṭam adhikṛtya
T04sanss06u:592: pratyuddhāratām avabhāsatāṃ ca pratilabdhukāmena |mahândhakārād ālokaṃ praveṣṭukāmena |
T04sanss06u:594: tathā kuto mamâlpapuṇyasya siddhir iti nīcacittapratiṣedhaḥ |
T04sanss06u:597: atra ca mantrāṇām ajñānān nâdhikâkṣarapāṭhe doṣo 'sti |
T04sanss06u:600: kiṃtu śraddhāvegaṃ bodhicittavegaṃ sarvôtsargavegaṃ ca pramāṇīkṛtyâvicārataḥ pravartitavyam avaśyaṃ buddhabodhisatvam ihâiva
T04sanss06u:613: namo 'stu te 'grôgraśāsānānāṃ raṇa haṃ phula sphāṭa vajrôttame svāhā ||
T04sanss06u:628: anena prathamaṃ piṇḍam aṣṭâbhimantritaṃ bhuñjīta bhaiṣajyarājatāṃ buddhabodhisatvānām anusmṛtya
T04sanss06u:651: yêmāṃ vidyāṃ sakṛc chṛṇoti sa sapta varṣāṇy ahinā na daśyate |
T04sanss06u:653: yaś câinaṃ ahir daśati saptadhâsya sphuṭen mūrddhârjakasyêva mañjarī ||yêmāṃ vidyāṃ dhārayati sa yāvajjīvam ahinā na daśyate |
T04sanss06u:655: imāni ca mantrapadāni sarpasya purato na vaktavyāni yatkāraṇaṃ sarpo mriyate ||
T04sanss06u:686: iti hi bhikṣavo jāṅgulyāṃ vidyāyāṃ udāhṛtāyāṃ sarvabhūtasamāgate sarvaṃ tathâvitathânanyathābhūtaṃ satyam aviparītam aviparyastaṃ |
T04sanss06u:717: rakṣa māṃ sarvasatvāṃś ca sarvabhayebhyaḥ sarvôpāye sôpasargebhyaḥ svāhā
T04sanss06u:730: imām api vidyām anantajātismarahetuṃ mahāprabhāvāṃ saptapañcāśadakṣarāṃ
T04sanss06u:745: namo sabbasammasaṃbuddhāṇaṃ sijjhantu me mantapadāḥ svāhā ||
T04sanss06u:751: tatra yadi vismṛtya paradravyam ātmabharaṇatṛṣṇayā paribhuṅkte kliṣṭâpattim āpadyate |
T04sanss06u:752: atha vitṛṣṇo anyāsakto vā satvakāryam anusmṛtya bhuṅkte na kliṣṭām āpattim āpadyate |
T04sanss06u:755: satvasvāmikais tu bhogaiḥ satvasvāmikâivâtmabhāvaḥ saṃrakṣatêty adoṣaḥ |
T04sanss06u:756: na hi dāsasya nityaṃ svāmikarmavyāpṛtasya svadravyam asti yena varteta ||
T04sanss06u:759: na câikântasvāmyarthaparasya dāsasya vyādhyādiviklavamateḥ svāminam ananujñāpyâpi bhuñjānasya
T04sanss06u:762: nâpy evaṃ kurvāṇasya bodhisatvasyântike kasyacid viditavṛttântasyâpy aprasādo yujyate mātsaryatyāgacittâparijñānāt
T04sanss06u:763: na câtra nyāye kaścit saṃdeho yuktaḥ |
T04sanss06u:764: sarvôtsargo hi pūrvam eva bhagavatkaṇṭhôktyā pratipāditaḥ |
T04sanss06u:766: tasya spaṣṭâvabodhârtham ayaṃ nyāyo 'bhiyukto na tu svârthâpekṣayêti ||
